augments.name: Ascension
augments.desc: After 15 seconds of combat, your units deal 50% more damage.

augments.name: Cutthroat
augments.desc: Assassins Mana-Reave the first unit they attack, increasing their maximum Mana by 50% until they cast. Assassins deal 10% more damage against Mana-Reaved targets. Gain a Qiyana.

augments.name: Assassin Crest
augments.desc: Gain an Assassin Emblem and a Kayn.

augments.name: Assassin Crown
augments.desc: Gain an Assassin Emblem, a Hand of Justice, and a Diana.

augments.name: Smoke Bomb
augments.desc: The first time Assassins drops to 70% health, they briefly enter stealth, becoming untargetable and shedding all negative effects. Any excess damage is reduced by 60%. Gain a Talon.

augments.name: Assassin Heart
augments.desc: Your team counts as having 1 additional Assassin. Gain a Kayn.

augments.name: Band of Thieves II
augments.desc: Gain 2 Thief's Gloves.

augments.name: Binary Airdrop
augments.desc: Your champions equipped with 2 items temporarily gain a random completed item at the start of combat.

augments.name: Shrug It Off
augments.desc: Bruisers regenerate 2.5% of their maximum Health each second. Gain a Sejuani.

augments.name: Bruiser Crest
augments.desc: Gain a Bruiser Emblem and a Taric.

augments.name: Bruiser Crown
augments.desc: Gain a Bruiser Emblem, a Redemption, and an Sylas.

augments.name: Bruiser Heart
augments.desc: Your team counts as having 1 additional Bruiser. Gain a Shen.

augments.name: Calculated Loss
augments.desc: After losing your combat, gain 2 gold and a free Shop refresh.

augments.name: Celestial Blessing I
augments.desc: Your units heal for 12% of the damage dealt by attacks and Abilities. Excess healing is converted to a shield up to 300 Health.

augments.name: Celestial Blessing II
augments.desc: Your units heal for 20% of the damage dealt by attacks and Abilities. Excess healing is converted to a shield up to 450 Health.

augments.name: Celestial Blessing III
augments.desc: Your units heal for 35% of the damage dealt by attacks and Abilities. Excess healing is converted to a shield up to 600 Health.

augments.name: Clear Mind
augments.desc: If you have no champions on your bench at the end of a round, gain 3 experience points.

augments.name: Component Grab Bag
augments.desc: Gain 3 random item components.

augments.name: Cybernetic Implants I
augments.desc: Your champions holding an item gain 100 Health and 8 Attack Damage.

augments.name: Cybernetic Implants II
augments.desc: Your champions holding an item gain 150 Health and 15 Attack Damage.

augments.name: Cybernetic Implants III
augments.desc: Your champions holding an item gain 250 Health and 25 Attack Damage.

augments.name: Cybernetic Shell I
augments.desc: Your champions holding an item gain 100 Health and 20 Armor.

augments.name: Cybernetic Shell II
augments.desc: Your champions holding an item gain 150 Health and 30 Armor.

augments.name: Cybernetic Shell III
augments.desc: Your champions holding an item gain 250 Health and 40 Armor.

augments.name: Cybernetic Uplink I
augments.desc: Your champions holding an item gain 100 Health and restore 2 Mana per second.

augments.name: Cybernetic Uplink II
augments.desc: Your champions holding an item gain 150 Health and restore 3 Mana per second.

augments.name: Cybernetic Uplink III
augments.desc: Your champions holding an item gain 250 Health and restore 4 Mana per second.

augments.name: Exiles I
augments.desc: Your units that start combat with no adajacent allies gain a 25% maximum Health shield for 10 seconds.

augments.name: Exiles II
augments.desc: Your units that start combat with no adajacent allies gain a 35% maximum Health shield for 10 seconds.

augments.name: Exiles III
augments.desc: Your units that start combat with no adajacent allies gain a 50% maximum Health shield for 10 seconds.

augments.name: Stand United I
augments.desc: Your units gain 1 Attack Damage and Ability Power per Trait active across your army.

augments.name: Stand United II
augments.desc: Your units gain 2 Attack Damage and Ability Power per Trait active across your army.

augments.name: Stand United III
augments.desc: Your units gain 3 Attack Damage and Ability Power per Trait active across your army.

augments.name: Electrocharge I
augments.desc: When your units receive critical strikes, they deal 50-110 (based on current Stage) magic damage to nearby enemies. (1 second cooldown).

augments.name: Electrocharge II
augments.desc: When your units receive critical strikes, they deal 85-145 (based on current Stage) magic damage to nearby enemies. (1 second cooldown).

augments.name: Electrocharge III
augments.desc: When your units receive critical strikes, they deal 115-235 (based on current Stage) magic damage to nearby enemies. (1 second cooldown).

augments.name: Featherweights I
augments.desc: Your 1 and 2 cost champions gain 25% Attack Speed and Move Speed.

augments.name: Featherweights II
augments.desc: Your 1 and 2 cost champions gain 35% Attack Speed and Move Speed.

augments.name: Featherweights III
augments.desc: Your 1 and 2 cost units gain 60% Attack Speed and Move Speed.

augments.name: First Aid Kit
augments.desc: All healing and shielding on your units is increased by 25%.

augments.name: Future Sight I
augments.desc: Know who you will fight next. Gain a Zephyr.

augments.name: Future Sight II
augments.desc: Know who you fight next. Gain a Radiant Zephyr.

augments.name: High Roller
augments.desc: Gain 3 Loaded Dice and 8 gold.

augments.name: High End Shopping
augments.desc: Champions appear in your Shop as if you were 1 level higher. Gain 10 gold.

augments.name: Hustler
augments.desc: If you have less than 20 gold at the end of a round, gain 2 gold.

augments.name: Item Grab Bag I
augments.desc: Gain 1 random completed item.

augments.name: Item Grab Bag II
augments.desc: Gain 2 random completed items and 2 Reforgers.

augments.name: Jeweled Lotus
augments.desc: Magic and true damage from your units' Abilities can critically strike. Your units gain 25% Critical Strike Chance.

augments.name: Luden's Echo I
augments.desc: When your units cast and deal Ability damage, the first target hit and a nearby enemy take 40-130 (based on current Stage) magic damage.

augments.name: Luden's Echo II
augments.desc: When your units cast and deal Ability damage, the first target hit and a nearby enemy take 55-160 (based on current Stage) magic damage.

augments.name: Luden's Echo III
augments.desc: When your units cast and deal Ability damage, the first target hit and a nearby enemy take 90-240 (based on current Stage) magic damage.

augments.name: Makeshift Armor I
augments.desc: Your units with no items gain 30 Armor and Magic Resist.

augments.name: Makeshift Armor II
augments.desc: Your units with no items gain 45 Armor and Magic Resist.

augments.name: Makeshift Armor III
augments.desc: Your units with no items gain 65 Armor and Magic Resist.

augments.name: Level Up!
augments.desc: When you buy experience points, gain an additional 3. You can now reach level 10.

augments.name: Meditation I
augments.desc: Your units without items equipped restore 4 Mana per second.

augments.name: Meditation II
augments.desc: Your units without items equipped restore 6 Mana per second.

augments.name: Meditation III
augments.desc: Your units without items equipped restore 8 Mana per second.

augments.name: Metabolic Accelerator
augments.desc: Your Tactician moves faster and heals 2 Health after a PVP round.

augments.name: New Recruit
augments.desc: Gain +1 maximum team size.

augments.name: Pandora's Items
augments.desc: Gain a random component. At the start of each round, items on your bench are randomized (excluding Tactician's Crown, Spatula, and consumables).

augments.name: Portable Forge
augments.desc: Open an Armory and choose 1 of 3 unique Artifacts crafted by Ornn.

augments.name: Radiant Relics
augments.desc: Open an Armory and choose 1 of 5 unique Radiant items.

augments.name: Recombobulator
augments.desc: Champions on your board permanently transform into random champions that cost 1 more. Gain 2 Magnetic Removers.

augments.name: Salvage Bin
augments.desc: Gain a random completed item. Selling champions breaks apart their full items into components (excluding Tactician's Crown).

augments.name: Second Wind I
augments.desc: After 10 seconds of combat, your units heal 40% of their missing Health.

augments.name: Second Wind II
augments.desc: After 10 seconds of combat, your units heal 60% of their missing Health.

augments.name: Second Wind III
augments.desc: After 10 seconds of combat, your units heal 100% of their missing Health.

augments.name: March of Progress
augments.desc: Gain 5 bonus experience points per round. You can no longer use gold to level up.

augments.name: Sunfire Board
augments.desc: At the start of combat, burn all enemies for 15% of their maximum Health over 15 seconds and reduce healing received by 50%.

augments.name: Phony Frontline
augments.desc: Gain 2 Target Dummies.

augments.name: The Golden Egg
augments.desc: Gain a massive golden egg that hatches in 11 turns. If you won vs player, receive bonus turn.

augments.name: Three's Company
augments.desc: Gain 3 random 3-cost champions.

augments.name: Wise Spending
augments.desc: Gain 2 experience points when you refresh your Shop.

augments.name: Thrill of the Hunt I
augments.desc: Your units heal 400 Health on kill.

augments.name: Thrill of the Hunt II
augments.desc: Your units heal 700 Health on kill.

augments.name: Tiny Titans
augments.desc: Your Tactician heals 30 Health, grows larger, and has 130 maximum Health.

augments.name: Ancient Archives I
augments.desc: Gain 1 Tome of Traits.

augments.name: Trade Sector
augments.desc: Gain a free Shop refresh each round.

augments.name: Built Different I
augments.desc: Your units with no Traits active gain 250-400 Health and 40-70% Attack Speed. (based on current Stage)

augments.name: Built Different II
augments.desc: Your units with no Traits active gain 300-600 Health and 50-80% Attack Speed. (based on current Stage)

augments.name: Built Different III
augments.desc: Your units with no Traits active gain 400-700 Health and 60-90% Attack Speed. (based on current Stage)

augments.name: True Twos
augments.desc: Gain 1 random 2-star Tier 1 champions and 1 random 2-star Tier 2 champion.

augments.name: Double Trouble I
augments.desc: If you have exactly 2 copies of a champion on your board, they both gain 22 Attack Damage, Ability Power, Armor, and Magic Resist. When you 3-star, gain a 2-star copy.

augments.name: Double Trouble II
augments.desc: If you have exactly 2 copies of a champion on your board, they both gain 33 Attack Damage, Ability Power, Armor, and Magic Resist. When you 3-star, gain a 2-star copy.

augments.name: Double Trouble III
augments.desc: If you have exactly 2 copies of a champion on your board, they both gain 44 Attack Damage, Ability Power, Armor, and Magic Resist. When you 3-star, gain a 2-star copy.

augments.name: Verdant Veil
augments.desc: Your units are immune to crowd control effects for the first 15 seconds of combat.

augments.name: Weakspot I
augments.desc: Your units' attacks ignore 20% of the target's Armor and reduce healing received by 50% for 3 seconds.

augments.name: Windfall
augments.desc: Gain 25 gold.

augments.name: Woodland Trinket
augments.desc: At the start of combat, your highest Attack Speed champion creates two 250 Health copies of themself (excluding items).

augments.name: Band of Thieves I
augments.desc: Gain 1 Thief's Gloves.

augments.name: Lategame Specialist
augments.desc: Gain 45 gold when you reach Level 9.

augments.name: Pandora's Bench
augments.desc: Gain 5 gold. At the start of every turn, Champions on the 3 rightmost bench slots transform into random champions of the same cost.

augments.name: AFK
augments.desc: You cannot perform actions for the next 3 rounds. Afterwards, gain 20 gold.

augments.name: Combat Training I
augments.desc: Your Champions permanently gain 1 Attack Damage every time they kill an enemy unit. Champions start with 5 Attack Damage.

augments.name: Best Friends I
augments.desc: Your units that start combat only adjacent to each other gain 10% Attack Speed and 15 Armor.

augments.name: Axiom Arc I
augments.desc: Your units gain 25 Mana on kill.

augments.name: Preparation I
augments.desc: Units on your bench gain 6 Attack Damage and Ability Damage every round, up to 24.

augments.name: Big Friend
augments.desc: Your units that start combat next to a unit with over 2000 Health take 10% less damage for the rest of combat.

augments.name: Astral Heart
augments.desc: Your team counts as having 1 additional Astral. Gain a Nami.

augments.name: Cannoneer Heart
augments.desc: Your team counts as having 1 additional Cannoneer. Gain a Tristana.

augments.name: Cavalier Heart
augments.desc: Your team counts as having 1 additional Cavalier. Gain a Lillia.

augments.name: Dragonmancer Heart
augments.desc: Your team counts as having 1 additional Dragonmancer. Gain an Ashe.

augments.name: Evoker Heart
augments.desc: Your team counts as having 1 additional Evoker. Gain a Lulu.

augments.name: Guardian Heart
augments.desc: Your team counts as having 1 additional Guardian. Gain a Thresh.

augments.name: Guild Heart
augments.desc: Your team counts as having 1 additional Guild. Gain a Twitch.

augments.name: Jade Heart
augments.desc: Your team counts as having 1 additional Jade. Gain a Gnar.

augments.name: Mage Heart
augments.desc: Your team counts as having 1 additional Mage. Gain a Nami.

augments.name: Mirage Heart
augments.desc: Your team counts as having 1 additional Mirage. Gain a Yone.

augments.name: Mystic Heart
augments.desc: Your team counts as having 1 additional Mystic. Gain a Nami.

augments.name: Ragewing Heart
augments.desc: Your team counts as having 1 additional Ragewing. Gain a Shen.

augments.name: Revel Heart
augments.desc: Your team counts as having 1 additional Revel. Gain a Jinx.

augments.name: Scalescorn Heart
augments.desc: Your team counts as having 1 additional Scalescorn. Gain a Braum.

augments.name: Shapeshifter Heart
augments.desc: Your team counts as having 1 additional Shapeshifter. Gain a Gnar.

augments.name: Shimmerscale Heart
augments.desc: Your team counts as having 1 additional Shimmerscale. Gain a Kayn.

augments.name: Swiftshot Heart
augments.desc: Your team counts as having 1 additional Swiftshot. Gain a Twitch.

augments.name: Tempest Heart
augments.desc: Your team counts as having 1 additional Tempest. Gain a Qiyana.

augments.name: Warrior Heart
augments.desc: Your team counts as having 1 additional Warrior. Gain a Yone.

augments.name: Whispers Heart
augments.desc: Your team counts as having 1 additional Whispers. Gain a Thresh.

augments.name: Urf's Grab Bag II
augments.desc: Gain 1 Spatula and 3 random item components.

augments.name: Living Forge
augments.desc: Gain a random Ornn item now and after every 10 player combats.

augments.name: Ancient Archives II
augments.desc: Gain 2 Tome of Traits.

augments.name: Cruel Pact
augments.desc: Buying XP costs 6 Health instead of gold. But Heal 3 Health after a round.

augments.name: Think Fast
augments.desc: Shop refreshes are free until the end of this round. Traits and other augments do not benefit from these free shops. Gain 8 gold.

augments.name: Cursed Crown
augments.desc: Gain +2 maximum team size, but take 100% increased player damage.

augments.name: Cannoneer Crown
augments.desc: Gain a Cannoneer Emblem, a Runaan's Hurricane, and a Tristana.

augments.name: Cavalier Unity
augments.desc: The Cavalier trait grants its bonuses to all of your Champions. This does not increase your number of Cavaliers. Gain a Sejuani.

augments.name: Cavalier Crown
augments.desc: Gain a Cavalier Emblem, a Redemption, and a Nunu.

augments.name: Dragonmancer Soul
augments.desc: Gain a Dragonmancer Emblem, a Hand of Justice, and a Lee Sin.

augments.name: Evoker Crown
augments.desc: Gain an Evoker Emblem, a Spear of Shojin, and an Anivia.

augments.name: Guardian Crown
augments.desc: Gain a Guardian Emblem, a Sunfire Cape, and a Braum.

augments.name: Guild Crown
augments.desc: Gain a Guild Emblem, a Giant Slayer and a Ryze.

augments.name: Jade Soul
augments.desc: Your team counts as having 1 additional Jade. Gain an Titan's Resolve and a Gnar.

augments.name: Mage Crown
augments.desc: Gain a Mage Emblem, a Spear of Shojin, and a Ryze.

augments.name: Mirage Crown
augments.desc: Gain a Mirage Emblem, a Hand of Justice, and a Nunu.

augments.name: Mystic Soul
augments.desc: Your team counts as having 1 additional Mystic. Gain a Spear of Shojin and a Lulu.

augments.name: Ragewing Crown
augments.desc: Gain a Ragewing Emblem, a Guinsoo's Rageblade, and a Swain.

augments.name: Revel Crown
augments.desc: Gain a Revel Emblem and a Jinx.

augments.name: Scalescorn Crown
augments.desc: Gain a Scalescorn Emblem, a Hand of Justice, and a Diana.

augments.name: Shapeshifter Soul
augments.desc: Your team counts as having 1 additional Shapeshifter. Gain a Sunfire Cape and an Elise.

augments.name: Shimmerscale Soul
augments.desc: Your team counts as having 1 additional Shimmerscale. Gain a Titan's Resolve and a Volibear.

augments.name: Swiftshot Crown
augments.desc: Gain a Swiftshot Emblem, a Guinsoo's Rageblade, and a Varus.

augments.name: Tempest Crown
augments.desc: Gain a Tempest Emblem, a Statikk Shiv, and a Lee Sin.

augments.name: Warrior Crown
augments.desc: Gain a Warrior Emblem, a Giant Slayer, and an Yone.

augments.name: Whispers Crown
augments.desc: Gain a Whispers Emblem, a Titan's Resolve, and an Sylas.

augments.name: Rich Get Richer+
augments.desc: Gain 18 gold. Your maximum interest is increased to 7.

augments.name: Urf's Grab Bag I
augments.desc: Gain 1 Spatula and 1 random item component.

augments.name: Gadget Expert
augments.desc: Direct Damage items deal 33% more damage as true damage. Gain a Statikk Shiv.

augments.name: Cluttered Mind
augments.desc: If your bench is full at the end of a round, gain 4 experience points.

augments.name: Last Stand
augments.desc: The first time you would die, instead drop to 1 Health. After this effect triggers, your units gain 200 Health, 20 Armor and Magic Resist, and 20% Omnivamp.

augments.name: Better Together
augments.desc: Aura items that buff your team have their effects increased by 33%. Gain a Locket of the Iron Solari.

augments.name: Combat Training I
augments.desc: Your Champions permanently gain 1 Attack Damage every time they kill an enemy unit. Champions start with 8 Attack Damage.

augments.name: Best Friends II
augments.desc: Your units that start combat only adjacent to each other gain 15 Attack Speed and 25 Armor.

augments.name: Axiom Arc II
augments.desc: Your units gain 40 Mana on kill.

augments.name: Astral Crest
augments.desc: Gain a Astral Emblem and a Nami.

augments.name: Intercosmic Gifts
augments.desc: Astral Orbs have a 100% chance to spawn a smaller orb that contains bonus loot. Gain a Nami.

augments.name: Personal Training
augments.desc: At the end of combat, Champions that started combat adjacent to Bruiser permanently gain 40 Health, increased by 20 if they survived. Gain a Shen.

augments.name: Titanic Strength
augments.desc: Bruisers gain 1.5% of their Health as Attack Damage. Gain a Tahm Kench.

augments.name: Cannoneer Crest
augments.desc: Gain a Cannoneer Emblem and a Jinx.

augments.name: Ricochet
augments.desc: Cannoneer's cannon shots bounce once, dealing 33% less damage. Gain a Tristana.

augments.name: Hot Shot
augments.desc: Cannoneer's cannon shots burn their targets, dealing 6% of the target's maximum Health as true damage over 2 seconds, and reducing healing by 50% for the duration of the burn. Gain a Tristana.

augments.name: Cavalier Crest
augments.desc: Gain a Cavalier Emblem and a Sejuani.

augments.name: Devastating Charge
augments.desc: Cavalier's first attack after charging deals 85 magic damage, increased by 1% for each Armor and Magic Resist they have. Gain a Lillia.

augments.name: Dragon Alliance
augments.desc: The Dragon trait remains active regardless of how many Dragons you have. Dragons gain 60 Armor and Magic Resist. Gain a random Tier 4 Dragon.

augments.name: Dragon Horde
augments.desc: The Dragon trait remains active regardless of how many Dragons you have. Dragons gain 30 Attack Damage and Ability Power. Gain a random Tier 4 Dragon.

augments.name: Inspire
augments.desc: When the Dragonmancer Hero gets a takedown, champions that share a trait with the Dragonmancer Hero gain 70% Attack Speed for 3 seconds. Gain a Ashe.

augments.name: Dragonmancer Crest
augments.desc: Gain a Dragonmancer Emblem and an Ashe.

augments.name: Evoker Crest
augments.desc: Gain an Evoker Emblem and a Lulu.

augments.name: Essence Theft
augments.desc: Evoker's attacks steal 5 Mana from their target. Gain a Lulu.

augments.name: Guardian Crest
augments.desc: Gain a Guardian Emblem and a Braum.

augments.name: Heroic Presence
augments.desc: Guardians taunt all enemies every 2 seconds. Enemies that attack a Guardian's shield take magic damage equal to 7% of the shielded unit's max Health (up to once per second). Gain a Thresh.

augments.name: Guild Crest
augments.desc: Gain a Guild Emblem and a Twitch.

augments.name: Loot Master
augments.desc: Gain a random component every 4 player combat rounds when you have at least Guild (2) active. Gain a Twitch.

augments.name: Gear Upgrades
augments.desc: Guild champions holding an item gain 25 Armor and another 250% of their Guild bonus. Gain a Twitch.

augments.name: Jade Crest
augments.desc: Gain a Jade Emblem and a Ashe.

augments.name: Eternal Protection
augments.desc: When one of your Jade champions would die, the nearest Jade Statue protects them, losing 70% of its max Health and transferring 200% of that amount to the champion.. Gain an Ashe.

augments.name: Penitence
augments.desc: Enemies are disarmed for 2.5 seconds the first time they attack a Jade Statue or are damaged by a Jade Statue's explosion. Gain a Gnar.

augments.name: Mage Crest
augments.desc: Gain a Mage Emblem and a Vladimir.

augments.name: Mage Conference
augments.desc: While the Mage trait is active, a random Mage portals onto your bench after combat with a player. Gain a Lillia.

augments.name: Mirage Crest
augments.desc: Gain a Mirage Emblem and a Nunu.

augments.name: Hallucinate
augments.desc: Mirage champions take 90% less damage for the first 6 seconds of combat. Gain a Yone.

augments.name: Ragewing Crest
augments.desc: Gain a Ragewing Emblem and a Kayn.

augments.name: Scorch
augments.desc: Every 5th instance of Ragewing champion's damage deals 20% more damage and is converted to true damage. Gain a Sena.

augments.name: Tantrum
augments.desc: After casting their first Ability, Ragewings restore 100% of their maximum Rage.

augments.name: Revel Crest
augments.desc: Gain a Revel Emblem and a Jinx.

augments.name: Party Favors
augments.desc: Gain 1 gold for every 6 firecrackers launched by Revel champions each combat. Additionally, gain a special prize the first time 100 total firecrackers are launched. Gain a Jinx.

augments.name: Party Time!
augments.desc: After Revels score a takedown, they gain 80% Attack Speed for 4 seconds. Gain a Jinx.

augments.name: Scalescorn Crest
augments.desc: Gain a Scalescorn Emblem and a Braum.

augments.name: Nomads
augments.desc: Scalescorns gain 10% damage every time they start combat in a new hex, up to 30%. Gain a Lillia.

augments.name: Beast's Den
augments.desc: Units that start combat next to at least 2 Shapeshifters gain 35% Attack Speed and Move Speed. Shapeshifters always gain this bonus. Gain a Gnar.

augments.name: Shimmerscale Crest
augments.desc: Gain a Shimmerscale Emblem and a Kayn.

augments.name: Reckless Spending
augments.desc: If you purchase both XP and a Shop Refresh during the Planning Phase, Shimmerscale champions and Champions having a Shimmerscale item gain 40% damage for the next combat phase. Gain a Kayn.

augments.name: Swiftshot Crest
augments.desc: Gain a Swiftshot Emblem and a Ashe.

augments.name: Press the Attack
augments.desc: Your Swiftshots' attacks apply a stack on their target for 5 seconds. Every third stack consumes all stacks to deal true damage equal to 4% of the target's maximum Health. Gain a Twitch.

augments.name: Tempest Crest
augments.desc: Gain a Tempest Emblem and a Qiyana.

augments.name: Eye of the Storm
augments.desc: At the start of combat, the unit in the center of the board gains 45 Ability Power, increased to 135 after Tempest lightning strikes. Gain a Qiyana.

augments.name: Secret Snax
augments.desc: Trainers have a 33% chance to secretly feed their dragonling bonus Snax. Gain a Tristana.

augments.name: Warrior Crest
augments.desc: Gain a Warrior Emblem and a Shen.

augments.name: Tiamat
augments.desc: Warrior's additional attacks deal 50% of their damage to enemies in a 1-hex area around their target. Gain a Yone.

augments.name: Whispers Crest
augments.desc: Gain a Whispers Emblem and a Thresh.

augments.name: Twilight Umbrage
augments.desc: Units that start combat next to Whispers are stealthed for 5 seconds.

augments.name: Combat Training II
augments.desc: Your Champions permanently gain 3 Attack Damage every time they kill an enemy unit. Champions start with 15 Attack Damage.

augments.name: Best Friends III
augments.desc: Your units that start combat only adjacent to each other gain 20% Attack Speed and 35 Armor.

augments.name: Astral Crown
augments.desc: Your team counts as having 1 additional Astral. Gain a Redemption and a Varus.

augments.name: Preparation II
augments.desc: Units on your bench gain 7 Attack Damage and Ability Damage every round, up to 28.

augments.name: Preparation III
augments.desc: Champions on your bench permanently gain 12 Attack Damage and Ability Power every round, up to 48.

augments.name: First Aid Kit II
augments.desc: All healing and shielding on your units is increased by 35%.

augments.name: Blue Battery
augments.desc: After casting their Ability, your units restore 20 Mana.

augments.name: Rich Get Richer
augments.desc: Gain 10 gold. Your maximum interest is increased to 7.

augments.name: Windfall+
augments.desc: Gain 35 gold.

augments.name: Windfall++
augments.desc: Gain 45 gold.

augments.name: Party Favors
augments.desc: Gain 1 gold for every 6 firecrackers launched by Revel champions each combat. Additionally, gain a special prize the first time 100 total firecrackers are launched. Gain a Jinx.

augments.name: Preparation I
augments.desc: Units on your bench gain 6 Attack Damage and Ability Damage every round, up to 24.

augments.name: Preparation II
augments.desc: Units on your bench gain 8 Attack Damage and Ability Damage every round, up to 32.

augments.name: Preparation III
augments.desc: Champions on your bench permanently gain 12 Attack Damage and Ability Power every round, up to 48.

augments.name: Living Forge
augments.desc: Gain a random Ornn item now and after every 10 player combats.

augments.name: Personal Training
augments.desc: At the end of combat, Champions that started combat adjacent to Bruiser permanently gain 80 Health, increased by 20 if they survived. Gain a Shen.

augments.name: The Golden Egg
augments.desc: Gain a massive golden egg that hatches in 11 turns. If you won vs player, receive bonus turn.

augments.name: Tri Force III
augments.desc: Your Tier 3 champions gain 333 Health, 33 starting Mana, and 33% Attack Speed.

augments.name: Mage Conference
augments.desc: While the Mage trait is active, a random Mage portals onto your bench after combat with a player. Gain a Lillia.

augments.name: Loot Master
augments.desc: Gain a random component every 4 player combat rounds when you have at least Guild (2) active. Gain a Twitch.

augments.name: Big Friend II
augments.desc: Your units that start combat next to a unit with over 2000 Health take 18% less damage for the rest of combat.

augments.name: TriForce I
augments.desc: Your Tier 3 champions gain 133 Health, 13 starting Mana, and 13% Attack Speed.

augments.name: TriForce II
augments.desc: Your Tier 3 champions gain 233 Health, 23 starting Mana, and 23% Attack Speed.

augments.name: Trade Sector+
augments.desc: Gain a free Shop refresh each round. Gain 8 golds.
